oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Alice Josephine Hopper Allen, circa 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Alice Josephine Hopper Allen (1914-1990). She wears a dark dress suit and is outside near some flowering bushes.
